messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

issues while editing documents templates sent wednesday november issues while editing documents templates dear have some issues while trying word or excel documents get blocked takes minutes until get restored haven had issues like these before could you please assist with best officer ext

My aim is to map this to "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," "Miscellaneous," "Storage," "Purchase," "Internal Project," or "Administrative rights" for accurate classification.
